content:
When I saw you cast your fishing rod just now,
It seemed as if you weren't casting bait at all,
But rather a "connection line to another realm"!
info: 幻雪关于钓鱼感想_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I once saw what appeared to be a snow-covered statue by the seaside.
When I approached and touched it, it moved!
...It turned out to be a master fisherman who had been waiting patiently in the snow.
info: 幻雪关于钓鱼感想_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I once tried a rather unique fishing method,
wherever the Lumia sparkled, that's where I would cast my line,
fate is just as enigmatic as fishing, wouldn't you agree~?
info: 幻雪关于钓鱼感想_幻雪流程闲聊1
幻雪关于钓鱼感想_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Gazing at the celestial river at night,
is something that requires a lot of patience,
just like fishing.
